thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Location and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Location and friendly staff - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Melody B
title: Location and friendly staff
text:
Lovely hotel with lovely staff- they surprised us with champagne and chocolate for our honeymoon.
Location of this hotel is the best, so close to oxford st, Chinatown, covent garden and there is endless restaurant around!! 5 mins walk to Tottenham underground, 10 mins walk to oxford circus. The room is very small, if you traveling with many big luggages it's quite inconvenient, but there is plenty of room to store your clothing in their shelf.
Amenities are great- they provide plates and cutlery.
We stayed here for 6 nights and both had good rest overall.
We loved this hotel and if we go to London again we would stay here with no doubt.
